title: Arcade Paradise Has You Building Your Own Arcade Spot | Hidden Gems
description:
Each week KC and Jesse check out an overlooked game on Steam and decide whether or not it's a "Hidden Gem". This week they're checking out Arcade Paradise.

title: Why Rainbow Six Siege's Sound Design is Its Most Important Element
description:
This episode of Anatomy is brought to you by OperaGX. Download the browser today: https://mtchm.de/cuea4 #sponsored 

Support us on Patreon to get Early Access to new videos, exclusive Discord perks & more for just $2 per month ►► https://www.patreon.com/the_escapist

In today's episode JM8 takes a dive into the realistic sound design of rainbow six siege and its importance when paired with information-based gameplay.

description:
